text: Schaff is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Adam Schaff, Polish Marxist philosopher *David Schley Schaff (1852–1941), American Presbyterian clergyman and American football pioneer *Morris Schaff (1840–1929), American Union Army officer and writer *Philip Schaff (1819–1893), church historian *William Schaff, artist and musician ==See also== *Schaff–Herzog Encyclopedia of Religious Knowledge
title: Schaff
